attributes.action: Table a motion of censure in Jeremy Corbyn for wasting parliamentary time
attributes.background: Jeremy Corbyn has tabled a no-confidence motion in the Prime Minister. This will not achieve anything as it cannot force a General Election. Therefore, it is a waste of Parliamentary time which could better be used discussing other matters.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because motions tabled by the Leader of the Opposition aren't something that the UK Government or House of Commons as a whole is responsible for.
